attributes.action: Guarentee The Necessary Funding To Enable Every Citizen Of This Nation To Have Access To An NHS Dentist Inside Their Local Area Within The Lifetime Of The Next Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The state of NHS dentistry is appalling & getting worse.  It will take a colossal effort to get it back to the shambles it was in in 1997.  It is a disgrace that NHS dentistry has been allowed to deteriorate to the extent it has.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Guarentee The Necessary Funding To Enable Every Citizen Of This Nation To Have Access To An NHS Dentist Inside Their Local Area Within The Lifetime Of The Next Parliament."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11084.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Dentist/
